sentence.Network_en: Work commitments forced her to uproot herself and her son from Reykjavik.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的工作迫使她和儿子从雷克雅未克搬走。

sentence.Network_en: He had no wish to uproot Dena from her present home.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没想过让德娜离开现在的家去别处居住。

sentence.Network_en: They had been forced to uproot their vines and plant wheat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们已被迫将葡萄藤连根拔除，改种小麦。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... uphold v 支持；拥护 uproot v 连根拔；根除 upturn n （价格）上涨，转好.
以u开头的英语英文单词 ... uprising 叛乱；起义，暴动 uproot 连根拔起 upset 难过的；不安的.
诛_百度百科 ... 要求；索取〖 askfor〗 铲除〖 eliminate;uproot〗 同本义 reproach.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... uproar 骚动 uproot 拔根 upset 烦恼.

list.abs: We must uproot our bad habits ., 我们必须彻底去掉我们的坏习惯.
将 - English translation - bab.la Chinese... ... 将...放逐 to outlaw 将…连根拔掉 to uproot 将...排成行列 to enrank.
the family decided to uproot themselves and emigrate to Australia .他们全家决定离开故土，移居澳大利亚。
The family decided to uproot themselves and emigrate to Australia ., 他们全家决定离开故土 , 移居澳大利亚.
She doesn ' t want to uproot herself ., 她不愿离乡背井.

entry.tran: 使离开久住之处；使迁移他处居住
entry.def: If you uproot yourself or if you are uprooted, you leave, or are made to leave, a place where you have lived for a long time.

example.ex: ...the trauma of uprooting themselves from their homes...
example.tran: 背井离乡给他们造成的心灵创伤

example.ex: He had no wish to uproot Dena from her present home.
example.tran: 他没想过让德娜离开现在的家去别处居住。

entry.def: If someone uproots a tree or plant, or if the wind uproots it, it is pulled out of the ground.

example.ex: They had been forced to uproot their vines and plant wheat.
example.tran: 他们已被迫将葡萄藤连根拔除，改种小麦。

example.ex: ...fallen trees which have been uprooted by the storm.
example.tran: 被暴风雨连根拔起、倒伏在地上的树木

means.word_mean: 1. move (people) forcibly from their homeland into a new and foreign environment;
2. destroy completely, as if down to the roots;

sentences.sentence: "the vestiges of political democracy were soon uprooted"

means.word_mean: 3. pull up by or as if by the roots;

sentences.sentence: "uproot the vine that has spread all over the garden"

auth_sentence.content: A system of tipping had prevailed...which he would endeavour to uproot.
auth_sentence.res_content: A system of tipping had prevailed...which he would endeavour to uproot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A system of tipping had prevailed...which he would endeavour to uproot.

auth_sentence.content: Pakistani jets streak overhead in the continuing battle to uproot Taliban and al Qaida.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pakistani jets streak overhead in the continuing battle to uproot Taliban and al Qaida.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pakistani jets streak overhead in the continuing battle to uproot Taliban and al Qaida.

auth_sentence.content: The Meadows residents said work crews will uproot lime trees and cause disruption during work to extend the tram line to Beeston.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Meadows residents said work crews will uproot lime trees and cause disruption during work to extend the tram line to Beeston.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Meadows residents said work crews will uproot lime trees and cause disruption during work to extend the tram line to Beeston.

stems_affixes.word_buile: up向上+front前面→在前面,在上面
up向上+front前面→在前面,在上面

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侯补,备用物,后备人员,支援者
stems_affixes.word_buile: back背后+up向上→在背后向上推→支持
up向上+heav=heave举起+al状态,性质→n.动乱,大变动

stems_affixes.value_cn: 机构,设置,装备,组织,计划,调整
stems_affixes.word_buile: set安置+up向上→词组set up合写
up向上+braid辫子→向上抓辫子→责骂
up向上+hold拿住→向上拿住→支持

Sentence.sentence: It's hard to uproot deeply held beliefs about cancer screening with scientific data.

sentences.cn: 台风把许多树连根拔起。

sentences.en: Many people were uprooted from their homes by the flood.
sentences.cn: 水灾令许多人背井离乡。
